Purpose: How to interpret competitor support columns.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Use PASS/PARTIAL/WEAK/NA/UNKNOWN consistently.
Key_Attributes_(suggested): PASS=Native & configurable; PARTIAL=Some support or needs customization; WEAK=Limited/SMB-grade; NA=Not comparable; UNKNOWN=needs verification.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Attach Evidence_URLs where you have official docs; otherwise mark as INFERRED/UNKNOWN.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Event classes; retention; redaction; export targets; access control.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Kernel must own audit posture so every canon behaves consistently.

Purpose: Encryption posture and key rotation policy.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): KMS reference; rotation; envelope encryption; field classes.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Treat as auditable policy rather than hidden infrastructure choice.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Environment type; safe-mode; debug logging; test data flags; outbound integration restrictions.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Great for migration sandboxes and cutover rehearsals.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Per-tenant overrides; staged rollout; precedence; audit history.
Key_Attributes_(suggested): flag_code, default, override, rollout_pct, constraints, audit
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Makes adding future features safe without breaking existing tenants.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Entitlements per module; limits; add-on packs.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Separates product packaging from technical feature flags.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Tenant id; plan; environment type; region/residency; parent tenant; status.
Key_Attributes_(suggested): tenant_id, name, plan, env(prod/sandbox), region, residency_zone, status, parent_tenant_id
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Not directly comparable to single-tenant ERPs; essential for SaaS ERP kernel.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Residency zone; allowed regions; transfer rules; encryption profile binding.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Enterprise customers often require this for procurement.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Cron/interval schedules; concurrency caps; tenant throttles; retry binding.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Enables period-close, FX revaluation, imports, and integrations.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Provider config references; sender identities; templates binding; failover.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Helps enterprises route notifications through their approved channels.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Per-tenant & per-client quotas; burst; enforcement mode.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Important once you open public APIs and webhooks.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Storage class; encryption; retention; access constraints; region.
Key_Attributes_(suggested): profile_code, backend, bucket, encryption, retention, region
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Needed for enterprise data residency + attachment compliance.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Template keys; locales; versioning; approval of template changes.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Lets you migrate document formats from legacy systems quickly.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Policy language; conditions; effect allow/deny; priority; testing.
Key_Attributes_(suggested): policy_id, resource, condition_expr, effect, priority, version
Standards/Reference: Odoo record rules example of CRUD targeting
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Implement with versioned expressions + test harness.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Client id/secret refs; scopes; redirect URIs; rotation; environment binding.
Key_Attributes_(suggested): client_id, scopes, redirect_uris, secret_ref, rotation, env
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Treat API clients as first-class principals; essential for migration tooling.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): SAML 2.0 + OIDC; metadata; cert rotation; tenant mapping; multiple IdPs.
Key_Attributes_(suggested): provider_type, issuer, endpoints, client_id, certs, mapping_rules
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Keep IdP config separate from local directory; support multiple IdPs per tenant.

Purpose: Groups for user assignment, RBAC targeting, and provisioning.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Nested groups; dynamic groups; external group mapping.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Dynamic groups reduce admin overhead in large orgs.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Allowed factors; per-role enforcement; step-up on sensitive actions.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Enterprise baseline. Expose controls in policy, not code.

Purpose: Password rules for local accounts (if any).
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Complexity; rotation; breach checking; lockout; recovery flows.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Even with SSO, keep policy for break-glass admin and service accounts.

Purpose: Canonical permission list used everywhere (UI, API, audit).
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Stable perm codes; resource+action; versioning; deprecations.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Treat as product contract; additive only.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Role codes; inheritance; templates; scoping constraints.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Keep roles separate from groups; allow tenant-specific role clones.

Purpose: Session/token TTL, idle timeouts, concurrent session limits.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Access/refresh TTL; idle timeout; revocation rules; device trust (optional).
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Make consistent across UI + API.

Purpose: Rules for API keys (if used): format, TTL, rotation, restrictions.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Key TTL; allowed IPs; scopes; rotation; audit requirements.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Prefer OAuth for user flows; API keys for service-to-service.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Rules by role + resource + field; masking mode; export restrictions.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Needed for PII and bank details.

Purpose: Restrict access by IP ranges / geo (optional).
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Allowed CIDRs; exceptions; enforcement mode; audit.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Useful for regulated industries and privileged admin access.

Purpose: Auto-assign roles based on attributes (department, location, job code).
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Rule expressions; precedence; audit trail.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Helps migrations: map legacy security groups to roles automatically.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): SCIM 2.0 endpoint; schema mapping; deprovision; group sync.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Implementing SCIM reduces migration/integration cost for enterprise customers.

Purpose: API scopes catalog (for OAuth clients) aligned to permissions.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Stable scope strings; mapping to permission catalog; deprecation rules.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Scopes should be additive and backward-compatible.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Service account types; allowed auth methods; rotation; least-privilege defaults.
Key_Attributes_(suggested): acct_id, type, auth_methods, rotation_days, allowed_scopes, owner
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Treat integrations as principals; separate from human users.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Conflicting permission pairs; severity; enforce vs warn.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Finance buyers ask for this in enterprise deals.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Group identity; reporting currency; consolidation scope; membership effective dating.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: NetSuite OneWorld supports multi-subsidiary in one account.

Purpose: Defines analytic dimensions available (cost center, dept, segment, etc.).
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Dimension list; constraints; defaults; validation; cross-module usage.
Key_Attributes_(suggested): dimension_code, name, type, scope, default_rules, validation
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Dynamics financial dimensions are a strong reference implementation.

Purpose: Values for each analytic dimension (e.g., cost center list).
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Stable codes; hierarchy; status lifecycle; effective dating (optional).
Key_Attributes_(suggested): dimension_ref, value_code, name, parent_value, status, effective_from/to
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Keep codes stable; enable mapping from legacy dimension values.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Jurisdiction; registration IDs; tax IDs; functional currency; addresses; effective dating.
Key_Attributes_(suggested): entity_code, country, reg_id, tax_id, functional_currency, addresses, effective_from/to
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Dynamics legal entity setup includes tax registration and attributes.

Purpose: Org hierarchy for reporting + security scoping (tree/graph).
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Parent/child; node types; effective dating; roll-up rules.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Dynamics has explicit org hierarchy planning guidance.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Address; timezone; legal entity; calendars; tax jurisdiction mapping.
Key_Attributes_(suggested): site_code, address, tzid, legal_entity_ref, calendars, tax_jurisdiction
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Sites are core for logistics + tax + reporting + security scopes.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Parent/child; base/functional currency; fiscal calendar; jurisdiction.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: NetSuite: base currency per subsidiary.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Scope; signing limits; dual-control rules; effective dating.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Feeds into approvals and payment authorization.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Intercompany partners; markup rules; elimination accounts; settlement methods.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: NetSuite OneWorld includes intercompany accounting & consolidation (overview).

Purpose: Ownership % and voting rights over time (graph).
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Effective dating; ownership%; voting%; control flags; share class refs.
Key_Attributes_(suggested): owner, owned, pct, voting_pct, share_class, effective_from/to, control
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Not all ERPs model it deeply; having it makes M&A and governance robust.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Appointment/resignation; director role; authority scope.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Useful for approval flows tied to legal authority.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Identity; holdings; beneficial owner; documents; effective dating.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Advanced governance; can be optional but schema-ready is good.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Period list; start/end dates; rollups (year/quarter/month/week).
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Make periods explicit so period close and reporting are deterministic.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Fiscal year start; period rules; quarter mapping; multi-calendar support.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: NetSuite accounting period setup is a useful benchmark.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): BCP-47 tags; defaults and fallbacks.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Separate locale from translation strings.

Purpose: Open/close/lock rules per module per period.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Status per module; lock date; close checklists; exception handling.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Kernel-owned to enforce consistency across all canons.

Purpose: Timezone master list used by system and sites.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Use IANA tzids; allow tzdb updates; store canonical tzid.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Never store only GMT offsets; DST breaks it.

Purpose: Date/time/number format profiles for UI + documents.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Patterns; separators; currency formatting by locale.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Store ISO 8601 in APIs/storage; format profiles for display only.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Holiday dates; recurrence; observance rules; exceptions.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Keep data-source pluggable; holidays change.

Purpose: Working days/shifts for SLAs, lead times, approvals.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Weekday rules; shifts; per-site overrides; effective dating.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Needed for manufacturing/service scheduling and accurate lead times.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Type list; normal balance; report mapping.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Keep separate from Chart of Accounts entries.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): ISO code; symbol; minor units; active flags; formatting ties to locale.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Minor units are required to drive precision rules.

Purpose: Defines functional/base currency per entity/subsidiary and rules for changes.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Functional currency per entity; restrictions on changing; effective date policy.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: NetSuite: subsidiary base currency cannot be changed after save (doc).

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Pair; rate; as-of time; rate type; source; audit history.
Key_Attributes_(suggested): base, quote, rate, as_of, rate_type, source, audit
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Store with audit and effective time to support back-dated postings.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Type code; usage; precedence; effective dating.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Needed for consolidated exchange rate types (avg/closing/historical).

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Journal categories; allowed posting accounts; workflow requirements.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Links to numbering, approvals, and posting rules.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Leading ledger; currency; GAAP; posting rules; period close ties.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Multi-ledger is needed for IFRS vs local vs tax books.

Purpose: Posting profiles/mappings (e.g., inventory posting, tax posting).
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Rules by transaction type; dimension defaults; suspense accounts.
Key_Attributes_(suggested): rule_id, trigger, debit_map, credit_map, defaults, suspense
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: One of the hardest migration areas; design rules to be data-driven.

Purpose: Precision and rounding rules for money/qty/rates/percent.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Currency minor units; quantity decimals; rate decimals; rounding method.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Prevents rounding drift across modules and integrations.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Method list; where applied (tax, cash rounding, quantity).
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Some jurisdictions require specific cash rounding.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Type; inclusive/exclusive; rates; exemptions; posting maps.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Make effective-dated; allow exemptions and special schemes.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Hierarchy; registration IDs; effective dates.
Key_Attributes_(suggested): jur_code, parent, country, region, authority_name, effective_from/to
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Supports VAT/GST/Sales tax and e-invoicing routing.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Regime types; jurisdiction binding; reporting schedules.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Needed to support multiple tax systems in one tenant.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Allowed currencies; per customer/vendor currency rules; rounding.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: QuickBooks supports transaction currencies but converts to home currency; understand limitations.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Methods; schedules; posting rules.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Important for revenue/expense recognition setups.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Method list; useful life; conventions; posting accounts.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Migration-friendly if you can model methods rather than hardcoding.

Purpose: FX provider registry and refresh rules.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Provider; refresh frequency; credentials refs; fallback.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Zoho describes auto exchange rates via third-party provider.

Purpose: Rules for deriving rates when no direct pair exists.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Bridge currency; allowed paths; precedence.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Critical for customers migrating from systems with strict rate sourcing.

Purpose: Payment method codes (bank transfer, cheque, card, etc.).
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Method codes; allowed currencies; bank file export binding; fees rules.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Bind methods to bank export formats and signatory controls.

Purpose: Payment terms used across AR/AP (Net 30, EOM, etc.).
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Term definitions; due date calculation; discounts; defaulting rules.
Key_Attributes_(suggested): term_code, days, method(net/eom), discount_pct, discount_days, defaults
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Payment terms are a big migration mapping object; keep stable codes.

Purpose: Defines reporting/secondary currencies for consolidated reporting.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Reporting currencies; translation rules; rate types mapping.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Key for multinational consolidation and management reporting.

Purpose: How reversals work (storno, opposite posting, auto reversal date).
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Methods; conditions; audit linkage.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Needed for accruals and error correction workflows.

Purpose: Inventory valuation methods (FIFO, Weighted Avg, etc.).
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Method; costing layers; rounding and revaluation interactions.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Needed for customers migrating inventory history.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Triggers; thresholds; certificates; reporting periods.
Key_Attributes_(suggested): rule_id, triggers, threshold, rate, cert_rules, reporting
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: A common migration pain pointmodel it explicitly.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): UNECE codes; symbols; active flags; category binding.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Store UNECE code even if you use internal codes.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Category list; base UOM per category; allowed conversions.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: You need this before robust inventory/PO/sales quantity math.

Purpose: Conversions within categories and packaging conversions.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Factor; rounding; direction; item-specific overrides; validation.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Separate physical conversions from item packaging conversions.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Dimension definitions; affects SKU; allowed values; hierarchy.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Critical for retail/manufacturing migrations.

Purpose: Rounding rules for quantities (min order qty, pack size, etc.).
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Rounding increments; enforcement mode; per item/category overrides.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Helps match legacy behavior during migration.

Purpose: Canonical document types used across ERP.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Doc codes; module binding; posting behavior; lifecycle; numbering link.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Doc types are the glue for numbering, approvals, and field-status control.

Purpose: Unique numbering generator for documents/master records.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Pattern; scope (tenant/entity/site); shared/per-entity; collision handling.
Key_Attributes_(suggested): seq_code, pattern, scope, start, end, next, padding, prefix
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Model scope + reset policies from day one to match legacy systems.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Required attachments by doc type; storage profile; retention; access.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: AP and compliance-heavy customers depend on this.

Purpose: Gapless sequences where required by law.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Reservation strategy; void handling; audit; strict posting integration.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Implement as opt-in policy. Its hard to add later.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Never/yearly/monthly/per period; fiscal-calendar binding; lock on close.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Needed for jurisdictions requiring yearly invoice numbering.

Purpose: Revisioning and amendment handling for controlled documents.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Revision scheme; immutable states; amendment doc types.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Needed for BOM, contracts, and posted invoices.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Schema code; version; validation rules; required fields; endpoints.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Make pluggable so new countries dont require refactors.

Purpose: Print/PDF templates for documents (invoice, PO, etc.).
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Template per doc type; locale variants; versioning; tenant overrides.
Key_Attributes_(suggested): template_code, doc_type, locale, version, content_ref, status
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Separate layout templates from business logic; enable per-tenant customization.

Purpose: Required/optional/hidden/read-only fields by doc type and state.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Rules by resource+doc type+state; conditional requirements; API enforcement.
Key_Attributes_(suggested): resource, field, doc_type, state, effect, condition
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Huge for migrations: mirror legacy required fields quickly.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): State list; transitions; invariants; terminal states.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Avoid hardcoding states per canon.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Levels; rules for what to capture; retention binding.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Lets enterprises tune audit posture without redeploy.

Purpose: Reason codes required for sensitive changes.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Reason code list; category; requires comment; applies-to.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Improves audit quality and investigations.

Purpose: PII/PCI/confidential classification labels and handling rules.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Classification levels; retention; masking/export restrictions.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Required to align IAM field policies with privacy posture.

Purpose: Translations for labels and master data descriptions.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Keyed strings; locale variants; fallback; versioning.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Never translate codes; translate display names only.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Multi-level approvals; amount thresholds; conditional routing; audit trail; override rules.
Key_Attributes_(suggested): policy_id, applies_to(resource/doc_type), thresholds, approver_roles, escalation_ref, effective_from/to
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Make policies data-driven; avoid hardcoding per module.

Purpose: Escalation and timeout behavior for approvals.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Escalate after N hours/days; notify; reassign; fallback approvers.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Tie to working-day calendar to avoid escalating over weekends/holidays.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Define states, transitions, guards, actions; per doc type bindings.
Key_Attributes_(suggested): template_code, states, transitions, guards, actions, bindings
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Use declarative state machines so modules inherit workflow capabilities.

Purpose: External ID namespaces and uniqueness rules.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Namespace per system; uniqueness scope; lock-after-bind rules.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Critical for migrations and bidirectional sync.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Key fields; time window; conflict response; replay behavior.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Prevents duplicate documents during retries.

Purpose: Mapping table for internal IDs to external IDs (many-to-many when needed).
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Mapping entries; conflict rules; versioning; historical mappings.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Keep mapping effective-dated to support rekeys and cutover.

Purpose: Registry of connected systems and endpoints.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): System codes; endpoints; auth refs; environments; owners.
Key_Attributes_(suggested): system_code, type, base_url, auth_ref, env, owner
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Needed for provenance and stable external ID namespaces.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Backoff strategy; max retries; DLQ route; alerts.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Make per-connector/per-tenant; keep safe defaults.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Events; target URL; signing secrets; retry policy; filtering.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Helps customers integrate without polling.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): ISO country list; active flags; region groupings.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Keep stable codes; allow aliases for legacy systems.

Purpose: Country-specific address formatting and validation rules.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Required fields; ordering; postal code patterns; script rules.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Helps migration cleanup and standardized printing.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Retention by classification; deletion/anonymization rules; access logging.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Even non-EU enterprises ask for privacy posture.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Language list; active flags.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Keep separate from locale tags (which combine language + region).

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Schema code; version; validation; endpoints; required fields.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Make pluggable.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Validate IBAN structure per country; checksum validation; store normalized.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Keep country-format registry pluggable; validation rules change.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Store BIC (8 or 11 chars); validate format; bind to bank master records.
Key_Attributes_(suggested): bic, institution_name, country, city, branch, status
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Treat as reference data; allow lookups and imports from registries.

Purpose: Incoterms trade terms used on sales/purchase documents.
Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Maintain 11 Incoterms codes; version tagging (Incoterms 2020 vs 2010); default per customer/vendor.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Store both code and version; migrations often need to preserve the historical version.

Minimum_Requirements_(P0): Store phone numbers in E.164 for APIs; keep display formatting; enforce max length; validation.
Notes_for_Migration/Extensibility: Normalize on ingest; keep raw input for audit/debug.
